must.title: Give Credit
must.description: Describes the need to give explicit credit to the author when distributing the software.

must.title: Include License
must.description: Including the full text of license in modified software.

must.title: State Changes
must.description: Stating significant changes made to software.

cannot.title: Hold Liable
cannot.description: Describes the warranty and if the software/license owner can be charged for damages.

cannot.title: Use Patent Claims
cannot.description: Describes the rights to practice patent claims of contributors to the code.

can.title: Commercial Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use the software for commercial purposes.

can.title: Disclose Source
can.description: Describes whether you must disclose your source code when you distribute the software.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Statically Link
can.description: Describes whether the library can be compiled into the program (linked at compile time rather than runtime, aka dynamic linking).

can.title: Rename
can.description: Describes the ability to change software's name if modified/distributed.
